hero.title: Ignacio Tomás Floría
hero.subtitle: I'm
hero.description: I have 5 years of experience as a software developer specializing in Frontend with React and Next JS. I have been in various projects developing web platforms with React and Next JS for large clients. I have helped improve and finalize projects in progress that needed a push to move forward. And I have been training and developing during all these years

description.p1: Hi, I'm Ignacio Tomás Floría, I'm a Frontend developer and I love creating and developing new and challenging projects that allow me to continue learning and growing as a professional. I started programming a few years ago, when I finished High School and decided to study a higher-level degree in Computer Networks. There, although it was little, I learned the basics of web programming with HTML and CSS. Since then, thanks to a colleague and good friend, who taught me almost everything I know about web programming, I have been specializing in various web programming languages.
description.p2: I have been able to participate in different projects in my first job as a web developer, ranging from a mobile application for booking paddle tennis courts to an Intranet. In these few years as a web developer, I have been able to learn and work with different web programming languages.

responsibilities.1: As a frontend helping to define the architecture and code strategy, as well as unit and integration tests for a tracking SaaS application for large clients to manage their products and shipments. Working with React Query, Next JS, Tailwind, UI/UX design and testing with Jest.
responsibilities.2: Development of a responsive web app to scan QR codes and barcodes for the shipment and tracking of data from real devices.

responsibilities.1: I developed a web platform with React connected to SharePoint for a hotel company to display information, news and be able to consult company information and documents.
responsibilities.2: Collaboration in a web banking project for a large Spanish client, to carry out frontend developments with Angular.
responsibilities.3: Management of different projects creating and supervising tasks together with teams with the SCRUM methodology
responsibilities.4: Code management with Git and Git Flow with Azure DevOps.

responsibilities.1: Development of an Intranet in REACT connected to a Database, user and access permission management. Made with Mongo DB, Express, React and Node JS.
responsibilities.2: Front-End Development of a mobile app with IONIC, for Android and IOS.
responsibilities.3: Maintenance and redesign of an e-commerce made with PHP to improve the current design to a more modern, responsive one with better UI/UX.

project2.title: Statify
